ygData.subject: Re: Wish List Part 4
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.  I am suprised no one has a wish list of really significant upgrade features for Gladiator:Beyond Freedom. I might add that I d like to see it done in 3d,

Hmm.  I am suprised no one has a wish list of really significant 
upgrade features for Gladiator:Beyond Freedom.

I might add that I'd like to see it done in 3d, but only if the 
scenario editor is really good.
